title: Cheryl looks stylish in a chic navy coat and sexy lace-up heels for London outing
text:
Her ex Liam Payne recently revealed that she would regularly become anxious about going out with him in public, due to the constant attention the pair received.

But Cheryl, 36, looked happy and relaxed as she stepped out in style in London on Friday.

The former Girls Aloud singer stunned as she wrapped up in a chic navy coat while strutting along in a pair of sexy lace-up heels.

Sensational: Cheryl, 36, looked happy and relaxed as she stepped out in style in London on Friday

The star certainly looked in high spirits as she enjoyed her morning in the British capital.

She donned a simple slightly sheer black top, which she causally tucked into a pair of velvet slim-leg jogging bottoms.

The Fight For This Love hitmaker ensured she was warm as she teamed the look with her structured coat.

Elevating the look, Cheryl boosted her petite height in a pair of chunky block heels which boasted a racy tie-up design on the front.

Casually chic: The former Girls Aloud singer stunned as she wrapped up in a chic navy coat while strutting along in a pair of sexy lace-up heels

Style savvy: She donned a simple slightly sheer black top, which she causally tucked into a pair of velvet slim-leg jogging bottoms

Wrapping up: The Fight For This Love hitmaker ensured she was warm as she teamed the look with her structured coat

Elevating the look: Cheryl boosted her petite height in a pair of chunky block heels which boasted a racy tie-up design on the front

Cheryl lived-up to her beauty icon status with a simple slick of make-up, consisting of bronzer and a lashing of mascara.

Opting for a fuss-free look, the Parachute songstress ensured that her long, sleek chestnut coloured locks were slicked back into a low ponytail.

Flashing a smile as she continued on about her day, Cheryl looked in high spirits.

Pretty: Cheryl lived-up to her beauty icon status with a simple slick of make-up, consisting of bronzer and a lashing of mascara

Babe: Opting for a fuss-free look, the Parachute songstress ensured that her long, sleek chestnut coloured locks were slicked back into a low ponytail

Happy: Flashing a smile as she continued on about her day, Cheryl looked in high spirits

Her sighting comes after her ex Liam, 26, revealed that he and Cheryl 'rubbed off on each other in a bad way' and hinted she 'frightened' him during a candid interview about their relationship.

The Stack It Up singer who split from Cheryl in July last year following a two year romance, also discussed how the pressure of their high-profile romance had led to the beauty becoming stressed over leaving the house.

Speaking on Jessie Ware's 'Table Manners' podcast about the strain on their romance, the star said: 'I think we kind of rubbed off on each other a little bit in that way. In a bad way, actually. All of that stuff puts so much pressure on a relationship.

Worries: Her ex Liam Payne (Pictured) recently revealed that she would regularly become anxious about going out with him in public, due to the constant attention the pair received

Candid: Liam, who split from Cheryl in July last year after two years, discussed how the pressure of their high-profile romance led to her becoming stressed over leaving the house

Speaking of Cheryl, Liam revealed: 'I think we kind of rubbed off on each other a little bit in that way. In a bad way, actually. All of that stuff puts so much pressure on a relationship'

The former One Direction star - who shares son Bear, two, with Cheryl- also said she had become anxious about going out with him in public, due to the constant attention the pair received.

He said 'For her, if you were going out somewhere, it would take so long to get out of the door because you're just so worried.'

Liam also hinted he was 'frightened' of Cheryl during their romance and said: 'She's strict. She's surprised me sometimes.

The hunk has now moved on with model Maya Henry, 19, with the pair making their red carpet debut at the launch event for Rita Ora's Escada collaboration at Paris Fashion Week earlier this month.

'She's strict': Liam also hinted he was 'frightened' of Cheryl during their romance
description: Cheryl, 36, looked happy and relaxed as she stepped out in style in London on Friday.
